## Visit The Kreeger Museum

### [_Make a Reservation_](https://www.kreegermuseum.org/visit/reservations)

### **Hours**

Sunday - Monday: Closed  
Tuesday - Saturday: 10:00am–4:00pm (Grounds close at 4:15pm)  
_Walk-in tickets are available. Advance reservations are recommended._ _**Admission**_ **Adults:** $15  
**Students and Educators (with ID):** $10  
**Seniors (62+):** $10  
**Military:** $10  
**Members:** Free   
**18 and Under:** Free  
  
If your party contains more than five guests, please email [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#22544b514b564d50514750544b41475162495047474547504f575147574f0c4d5045) to make a reservation.  
  
Please see below for affiliate admission policies.

### **Parking**

**Please consider shared-ride or public transit services.** The closest Metro stops are Tenleytown-AU and Cleveland Park, both about a 45-minute walk from The Kreeger Museum, and the nearest bus stops are on the D90, D96, C85, and D94 lines. To plan your visit on public transportation, please visit [https://www.wmata.com/schedules/maps/.](https://www.wmata.com/schedules/maps/) We have extremely limited parking on museum grounds. Parking is not permitted in the circular forecourt in front of the museum with the exception of handicapped parking.

### **Photography**

Non-flash photography (with iPhone/Android/basic camera) is allowed in the galleries, except where othe...
